<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clockwork Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2310)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 146 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 79

**Price** 20,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Paper-thin interlocking cogs and gears make up the bronze _clockwork cloak_.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You're struck by a melee attack with a held weapon;  **Effect** The folds of the cloak attempt to divert the attack and catch the weapon in the cloak's gears. Make an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the attacking creature.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You wrap the cloak around yourself and the winding gears decelerate your body, causing you to enter standby mode. While in standby mode you don't need to eat, drink, or sleep. You remain aware of your surroundings but take a –4 penalty to Perception checks. You can stay in standby mode indefinitely, although your body ages normally. You can leave standby mode as a free action. If you do so to initiate combat, you gain a +2 item bonus to your initiative roll.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Clockwork Cloak
